config.section.BasicConfig.name: Basic Configuration
config.DefaultFrame.name: Default Frame
config.DefaultFrame.description: Select default portrait frame to display.
config.DisableConditionalVariation.name: Disable Conditional Variation
config.DisableConditionalVariation.descr: Display selected 'Default Frame' without any other variation.
config.HideHeartIndicator.name: Hide Heart Indicator
config.HideHeartIndicator.description: This will hide heart level indicator that located on bottom right side of character portrait. Heart level will still show when hovered over.
config.section.ModCompatibility.name: Mod Compatibility
config.SyncFarmerPortraits.name: Farmer Portraits - Overlay Frame
config.SyncFarmerPortraits.description: Set farmer portrait frame as the same one as the character portrait frame when 'Farmer Portraits' mod is installed.
config.BaseBackgroundFarmerPortraits.des: Set base game portrait frame as base to overlay on. If recolor or other base is desired you need to edit 'Farmer Portraits' mod to configure.
config.DisableWhenGaldoranThemeActive.de: Set farmer portrait frame as the same one as the character portrait frame when 'Farmer Portraits' mod is installed.
